sense.def:
A good deal of something
ali
a great deal of something
je veliko nečesa.

seg.quote: There was a great deal of concern about energy shortages.
The teaching of the older children is a good deal better.

sense.def:
A deal
je dogovor ali ravnanje, zlasti pri poslovanju.

seg.quote: He certainly hadn't done badly on the deal.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
has had a bad deal
, je imel smolo ali so z njim ravnali krivično.

seg.quote: He has had a lousy deal out of life.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To deal someone a blow
pomeni nekoga udariti ali ga poškodovati.

seg.quote: This woman dealt him an alarming series of blows.
The growth of modern industry had dealt a heavy blow to their way of life.

sense.def:
To deal cards
pomeni dati igralne karte igralcem pri partiji kart.

seg.quote: Deal seven cards to each player.
Whose turn is it to deal?

sense.def:
To deal in a type of goods
pomeni, da prodajamo tisto vrsto blaga.

seg.quote: The shop deals only in trousers.

sense.def:
To deal out cards
pomeni razdeliti igralne karte igralcem v partiji kart.

To deal with a situation or problem
pomeni storiti vse, kar je treba, da v določenih okoliščinah ali težavah dosežemo zaželeni rezultat.

seg.quote: They learned to deal with any sort of emergency.

sense.def:
Če knjiga, govor ali film
deals with a subject
, se ukvarja z neko témo.

seg.quote: The film deals with a strange encounter between two soldiers.
